title: Sparkling Strawberry Lemonade Soda
description: This homemade sparkling strawberry lemonade is the MOST yummy fizzy strawberry drink that you’d expect to pay $5 (or more!) for at a trendy coffee shop — but you can make it right at home for a fraction of the cost. Even better? You can control how sweet it is and know exactly what’s goingRead More
author: Crystal Paine
